column4: Hi, I'm trying to completely erase the contents off a dvdr (it holds the ubuntu install). how do i do this?
a dvdr? break it into small pieces.. grind it up... melt it..
it's a dvdrw actually, and could i have a real answer perhaps <_<
oh.. a dvdrw.. that seriously changes the question...not sure how to do that..never really messed with rw-discs in ubuntu
